Ingredients.1: 2 (10.5 ounce) cans condensed, 98% fat-free cream of chicken soup with 30% less sodium

Ingredients.5: 0.5 cup skim milk, or more as needed

Ingredients.7: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach - thawed, drained, and squeezed dry

Directions.1: Combine condensed soup, chicken, sour cream mozzarella cheese, 1/2 cup skim milk, and Parmesan cheese in a slow cooker. Add spinach, pulling it apart and shredding it as you put it in. Mix until well blended.

Directions.2: Cover and cook on Low until all cheeses are melted and the dip is deliciously gooey, 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Add up to 1/2 cup more milk if you feel the dip is cooking up too thick.
